p: The amplified PCR product was digested with restriction enzymes XhoI and XbaI and ligated using the NEB T4 ligase ( http://www.neb.com) into XhoI and XbaI site in geminiviral vector pBYR11ek2Md. For green fluorescent protein (GFP) control vector pBYR2ek2Md was used. The correct insertion of HA DNA was confirmed by colony PCR, restriction enzyme digestion, and Sanger sequencing.
